text: Tum mein se jo log marr jayein, unke pichey agar unki biwiyan zinda hon, to woh apne aap ko char mahine dus din roke rakkhein, phir jab unki iddat poori ho jaye, to unhein ikhtiyar hai apni zaat ke maamle mein maroof tareeqe se jo chahien karein tumpar iski koi zimmedaari nahin. Allah tum sab ke aamaal se bakhabar hai
